entry.name: slide
entry.title: Slide Effect
entry.desc: Slides the element out of the viewport.

argument.name: direction
argument.desc: The direction of the effect. Possible values: "left", "right", "up", "down".

argument.name: distance
argument.desc: The distance of the effect. Defaults to either the height or width of the elemenet depending on the direction argument. Can be set to any integer less than the width/height of the element.

example.desc: Toggle a div using the slide effect.
example.html: Click anywhere to toggle the box.
